column4: In a compaq notebook with 1 gb of ram and a radeon xpress 200m which would be more appropriate to install? Windows xp dual boot with slackware (or freeBSD) or install Ubuntu 12.04 LTS around hd?
totally depends on the task you want to do. since BSD is not Linux.
200m is a very low end video card.  so Lubuntu May give better preformacen an0n
